properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 2:27PM MST until February 7 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO
4 PM MST FRIDAY FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE WASATCH BACK...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected for the Ogden Valley. Total snow
accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Elsewhere, 2 to 6 inches of
new snow is expected for the remainder of the Wasatch Back.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially in the
Ogden valley.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM MST FRIDAY FOR THE OGDEN VALLEY
